entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C

Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
